text: Hasan Siraj Suja is a Bangladeshi politician and lawyer. He is a politician of Jatiya Party. He is an Advisor of the Chairman in the Central Committee of Jatiya Party. He was a Joint Secretary General in the Central Committee of Jatiya Party. Besides, he is working as a vice president of Jatiyo Ainjibi Federation, lawyer wing of Jatiya Party. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi lawyers Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:People from Magura District Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Hasan Siraj Suja
